original:
Berlin, Germany - The German opposition party, The Left, has launched a campaign to push for the approval of a post-war reconciliation pact with the Czech Republic. The pact, which has been in negotiation for several years, aims to address the grievances of Czech civilians who were expelled from Germany after World War II.
The pact has been a source of dispute between Germany and the Czech Republi
sampled:
Berlin, Germany - The German opposition party, The Left, has launched a campaign to push for the approval in a post-war reconciliation pact with the Czech Republic. The pact, which has been in negotiation for several years, aims to address the grievances with Czech civilians who were expelled from Germany after World Battle II.
The pact has been a source of dispute between Germany and the Czech Republi
